xbrli:xbrl.sob:StatementByExecutiveAndSupervisoryBo: Statement by the management
xbrli:xbrl.sob:IdentificationOfApprovedAnnualReport: The Board of Directors and the Management Board today considered and approved the interim report of the BioPorto Group for the period January 1, 2018 – March 31, 2018.
xbrli:xbrl.sob:ConfirmationThatAnnualReportIsPresen: The interim report, which is unaudited and has not been reviewed by the company's auditors, is presented in accordance with IAS 34 “Interim financial reporting” as adopted by the EU and additional Danish disclosure requirements for interim reports of listed companies.
xbrli:xbrl.sob:ConfirmationThatFinancialStatementGi: In our opinion, the interim report gives a true and fair view of the Group’s assets, liabilities and financial position as of March 31, 2018, and of the results of the Group’s operations and cash flows for the period January 1, 2018 – March 31, 2018.
xbrli:xbrl.sob:ManagementsStatementAboutManagements: Furthermore, in our opinion the management's report includes a fair review of the development and performance of the business, the results for the period and the Group’s financial position in general and describes the principal risks and uncertainties that it faces.
xbrli:xbrl.ifrs-dk:NameOfComponentOfCashFlowsFromUs: Cash generated from operations before working capital
Cash generated from operations before working capital
Cash generated from operations before working capital
